definition: A term used to describe a specific part of the human body, typically associated with the upper limbs, specifically the area between the shoulder and the hand. It is commonly used in various contexts, including anatomy, clothing, and physical activities.

examples.german: Ich habe einen ärmellosen Pullover gekauft.
Sie hat einen ärmellosen Rock getragen.
Der ärmellose Mantel ist sehr modisch.
examples.english: The sleeveless coat is very fashionable.
He is wearing a sleeveless t-shirt.

examples.german: Die ärmellose Bluse passt gut zu der Hose.
examples.english: The sleeveless blouse goes well with the pants.
